content:
If you are looking for the Zulip chat stream for the SDOH-CC FHIR IG development and testing, you have found the right place.

This is where we will field questions and hold discussions during Connectathon testing activities , too.

Welcome! And thanks for your interest and participation in creating FHIR-based standards for sharing Social Determinant of Health (SDOH) information.

Here's the link for the Gravity Project Confluence space: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/GRAV/The+Gravity+Project

Hello all, cross posting this from the OMOP+ FHIR stream. I help organize the OHDSI Health Equity workgroup and participate in the OHDSI Vocabulary workgroup. For our next health equity workgroup meeting (Tuesday, November 2nd at 2PM Eastern), we plan to discuss terminologies and mappings for patient-level social determinants of health, risk factors, and needs, and other domains useful for health equity research. Y'all are further along than us in this space. I'm interested in seeing how the OMOP+FHIR collaboration could enhance both of our efforts. Is there anyone here that would be able to participate in this meeting? Possibly giving a 5-7 minute overview of the work and terminologies?
Hello, We will have someone from the Gravity Team attend. We will provide an update as to who that will be.
